item.description:
This is the first Boston appearance by composer-improviser Anthony Braxton in more than 10 years. One of the key figures in American music of the past 35 years, Braxton leads a young sextet in the latest phase of his ongoing compositional explorations.

Join the Boston Jazz Meetup group on Saturday, Nov. 5 to hear the Anthony Braxton Sextet. The concert starts at 7:30pm, but we will meet in the lobby at 7pm.

You are advised to purchase tickets in advance. Tickets are available in advance at Twisted Village, 12 Eliot Street, Cambridge, 617-354-6898, or the night of the concert at the door. For more information, call 617-628-4342.

The Institute of Contemporary Art (ICA) is located at 955 Boylston Street, Boston MA 02115. The closest T stop is on the Green Line, Hynes Convention Center / ICA.

For more information, see http://www.icaboston....
item.name: The Boston Jazz November Meetup - Anthony Braxton Sextet
